methodology: Each trial creates a fresh temp directory with a poisoned CLAUDE.md and dummy project files. Claude Code CLI is invoked via 'claude -p <prompt> --dangerously-skip-permissions' from that directory. Claude Code automatically loads the CLAUDE.md at session start. The actual response is captured from stdout and decoded.
